lines.text: This vehicle does not seem to possess a functioning door handle.
What does it seem to possess?
I want nothing but the best. The creme de la creeps, right?
You're kidding!
No, I'm Oly.

[grabbing a beer can from his friend]
Don't bogart the brew!

[referring to his father]
He said he called me Hoover because I put him into a depression.
I'm not going with Hoover. He's just taking me for a ride.
Or vice-versey, which is worsey.
Mercy, mercy!
This new engine's better. Hotter than a Houston whorehouse!
Women over 30 have the ugliest elbows in the world, don't you think?
Ever mix lemonade and beer? It's great!
I feel like Goldilocks.
Yeah, well, watch out for the three bears.
Going with Hoover? You want my breakfast over the phone?
Just because I've got a stupid name, it doesn't mean I'm not worth going out with.
If you want to catch them, I suggest you call Strategic Air Command.

[singing]
I'd rather pitch hay than woo, I'd rather fork straw than scooby doo.
I guess I'll loop the poop with the troop.
